feed.title: Chad Underwood
feed.subtitle: Personal site of Chad Underwood. Chad Underwood is a Systems Anaylst who specializes in Process Improvement.

entry.title: Jekyll-Config-YAML
entry.content: YAML is the configuration settings of a Jekyll site. You can setup custom fields to setup easy to change settings. This works great for things like social media names or things that are hard to remember but need to be referred to a lot.
entry.summary: YAML is the configuration settings of a Jekyll site. You can setup custom fields to setup easy to change settings.

entry.title: Welcome Letter
entry.content:
I am glad you stopped at my site. I will share ideas, notes, and takeways during my technical journey and some other topics that are interesting to me.

If you would like to find out more about me please make sure to check out the about me section of the site. Please make sure to check back often for updates.

Sincerely, Chad Underwood
entry.summary: I am glad you stopped at my site. I will share ideas, notes, and takeways during my technical journey and some other topics that are interesting to me.
